about: Final-year informatics student at Telkom University keen on machine learning, cloud computing, and backend development. Holding certifications in TensorFlow and data visualisation from Google and PASAS. Won two data competitions and was a finalist in a statistics competition. Graduated with distinction and was in the top 53 for best projects from Bangkit Academy. I interned as a data scientist at Telkom Indonesia. Active on campus as an assistant lecturer, practicum, and lab during my studies. Fully-funded scholarship from the East Kalimantan government. I love to improve myself, so I sought opportunities learn new things to test my limit and create an impact.
